skill.falchionmoveset.falchion_art.toolt:
Slice enemies in a wide area. There will be three different attacks depending on the direction you type. 
Fearless: The third normal attack will not be interrupted by the enemy's attack. 
Forward: Perform two quick upward slashes to the front, which can effectively knockback the enemy. 
Left/Right: Fast diagonal slash that cannot be interrupted by enemy attacks. 
Backward: After sweeping across a wide area, perform a slash on the enemy that knocks them down. Can use air slash to perform additional attacks on downed enemies
